fields.section_text:
<script>
    const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(entries => {
            parent.postMessage({
                type: "heightChange",
                data: entries[0].target.clientHeight,
            },"*");
        }
    )
    resizeObserver.observe(document.body)
</script>
Get the current URL

Please answer the following questions. Be as accurate as possible as the answers you provide will assist in automatically assigning priority and urgency to your issue, as well as routing it to the correct team.

Thanks

Robo-Agent!

fields.section_heading: Could you provide me with your details please?...

fields.section_text: PLEASE NOTE: Please enter the details of the requester in this section, as though they are filling in the form (Client contact who raised this issue)

fields.name: your_name
fields.label: Your Name

fields.name: your_email_address
fields.label: Your Email Address

fields.name: your_phone_number
fields.label: Your Phone Number

fields.name: are_you_reporting_this_on_behalf_of_someone_else
fields.label: Are you reporting this on behalf of someone else?

fields.name: please_select_your_relationship_to_the_person_you_are_requesting_this_for
fields.label: Please select your relationship to the person you are requesting this for:

fields.section_heading: Now I need the details of the person you are logging this for please...

fields.section_text:
We will put the ticket in your colleague's name and work with them directly to resolve the issue. We understand that they may be busy, but we find that running our questions through intermediaries can turn a 5 minute fix into a 5 day fix sometimes, and then no one is happy, least of all me!

Thanks

Robo-Agent!

fields.name: their_name
fields.label: Their Name

fields.name: their_email_address
fields.label: Their Email Address

fields.name: their_contact_phone_number
fields.label: Their Contact Phone Number
fields.description: A direct dial or mobile/cell number is preferable please.  Whilst my colleagues love talking to all of you, we don't like the silence as they run around your property trying to find their colleague. I get lonely sometimes :(

fields.name: their_job_positionjob_title
fields.label: Their Job Position/Job Title
fields.description: Eg: Associate, F&B Manager, Chief Cook and Bottle Washer....

fields.name: why_couldnt_your_colleague_log_this_themselves
fields.label: Why couldn't your colleague log this themselves?

fields.section_heading: Now I'd like you to provide me ALL of the details...

fields.description: In most case you can find this on your desktop wallpaper.

fields.label: Please provide a summary of the issue in as much detail as possible:
fields.description: E.g: Unable to receive email or cannot complete night audit etc

fields.name: are_there_any_screenshots_or_documents_that_may_help_us_understand_your_issue_if_so_attach_them_here
fields.label: Are there any screenshots or documents that may help us understand your issue? If so, attach them here...

fields.label: Customer Group

fields.label: Company

fields.name: department
fields.label: Department

fields.section_heading: Tell me what type of issue this is...

fields.section_text:
PLEASE NOTE:
If you are raising a ticket on behalf of a customer/client user or any non-Six Star third party,
please select 'Impersonate' from the 'Admin' menu in Six Star:Manage (or click here) to search for and select the user to impersonate them and ensure that they are a valid Six Star:Manage contact.

Once you are impersonating the user, please click on 'NEW REQUEST' to complete and submit this form on their behalf.

If you are unable to impersonate the user, please raise a new ticket from the 'NEW TICKET' button on the Ticket Board in Six Star:Manage (or click here)

PLEASE NOTE:
If you are raising a ticket on behalf of a customer/client user or any non-Six Star third party,
please complete the form with the requester's details as though it is the requester completing the form rather than you yourself.
